Hero.title: About REO
Hero.description: Specialized electrician in Morocco for 20+ years: motor winding, hotel panels, building installations. Proximity service, compliance, and reactivity.

Story.title: Our Story
Story.description1: Founded in 2003, REO has specialized in motor winding, hotel electrical panels, and building installations in Morocco. Our journey began with a simple mission: to provide exceptional electrical services that prioritize safety, compliance, and customer satisfaction.
Story.description2: Over the years, we have expanded our services, embraced new technologies, and built lasting relationships with hotels and building managers. Today, we continue to uphold the same values that guided us from the beginning: integrity, professionalism, and a commitment to excellence.

Mission.title: Our Mission
Mission.description: To provide safe, compliant, and innovative electrical solutions for hotels and buildings in Morocco while maintaining the highest standards of quality, safety, and customer service.

Vision.title: Our Vision
Vision.description: To be the leading electrical services provider in Morocco, known for our commitment to safety, compliance, and exceptional customer experiences in the hospitality and building sectors.

Values.title: Our Values
Values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

safety.description: We prioritize the safety of our clients, team members, and the community in every project we undertake.

quality.description: We maintain the highest standards of workmanship and use only the best materials and equipment.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new technologies and methods to provide cutting-edge electrical solutions.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We conduct business with honesty, transparency, and respect for our clients and team members.

q1.question: How long does motor rewinding take?
q1.answer: Typically 3-7 days depending on motor size and complexity. We provide precise timelines during diagnosis.

q2.question: What is the warranty on rewound motors?
q2.answer: We provide a complete workshop guarantee on workmanship and materials, with traceability reports.

q3.question: Do you work on all motor types?
q3.answer: Yes, we work on single-phase and three-phase motors, from small pumps to large industrial motors.

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions | REO Electric
meta.description: Answers to frequently asked questions about our electrical services, motor winding, electrical panels, and installations in Morocco.

Hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Hero.description: Find answers to your questions about our electrical services in Morocco.

whatServices.question: What services does REO offer?
whatServices.answer: We offer three main services: motor winding (diagnosis, repair, workshop guarantee), electrical panels for hotels (TGBT, distribution panels, kitchens, laundry rooms), and building installations (rising mains, GTL, common lighting, surge protectors). All our services comply with Moroccan standards and include complete documentation.

serviceArea.question: In which area do you operate?
serviceArea.answer: We operate mainly in the [REGION] region with an extended service area. For emergency interventions, we can travel to a wider radius. Contact us to check availability in your area.

emergencyService.question: Do you offer emergency service?
emergencyService.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 emergency service for critical breakdowns. Call +212 667924515 or WhatsApp +212 667924515 for rapid intervention. Our emergency rates are transparent and communicated before intervention.

certification.question: Are you certified and insured?
certification.answer: Yes, we are certified and insured. We have decennial insurance [INSURANCE_NUM], electrician license [LICENSE_NUM], and comply with all Moroccan standards. All our electricians are trained and certified.

motorDiagnosis.question: How does motor diagnosis work?
motorDiagnosis.answer: The diagnosis includes: electrical tests (insulation, resistance), vibration analysis, performance verification, and fault identification. We provide a detailed report with photos and recommendations. The diagnosis is free and without commitment.

rewindingTime.question: How long does motor rewinding take?
rewindingTime.answer: The delay depends on motor size and complexity: small motors (1-3 days), medium motors (3-7 days), large industrial motors (7-15 days). We communicate a precise timeline during diagnosis and respect our commitments.

warranty.question: What warranty on rewinding?
warranty.answer: We offer a complete workshop warranty: 2 years on rewinding, 1 year on parts, with complete traceability. The warranty covers manufacturing and assembly defects. We provide a warranty certificate with serial number.

panelDesign.question: Do you design custom panels?
panelDesign.answer: Yes, we design all our panels to measure according to your needs: sizing, selectivity, protection, aesthetics. We respect NF C 15-100 standards and hotel specifications. Each project is unique and documented.

compliance.question: Do you comply with Moroccan standards?
compliance.answer: Absolutely. We comply with all Moroccan standards: NF C 15-100, hotel standards, thermal regulations. We provide complete technical documentation and compliance certificates. All our work is controlled and validated.

buildingInstallation.question: What does a building installation include?
buildingInstallation.answer: The installation includes: rising mains, GTL (General Low Voltage), distribution panels, common lighting, surge protectors, grounding, and technical documentation. We also handle administrative procedures and controls.

timeline.question: What timeline for a building installation?
timeline.answer: The delay depends on size: small building (2-4 weeks), medium (4-8 weeks), large (8-16 weeks). We plan work in phases to minimize inconvenience. A detailed schedule is provided before start.

quoteProcess.question: How to get a quote?
quoteProcess.answer: Contact us by phone +212 667924515, WhatsApp +212 667924515, or email [EMAIL]. We schedule a free visit to study your needs, then send you a detailed quote within 48h. The quote is free and without commitment.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept: bank transfer, check, cash, and installment payment for large projects. A 30% deposit is required at start, balance upon completion. We provide all invoices and supporting documents.
